includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: After his main investor pulls out, Harry Selfridge tries to find the money to build a pioneering Oxford Street department store.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After his main investor pulls out, Harry Selfridge tries to find the money to build a pioneering Oxford Street department store.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After his main investor pulls out, Harry Selfridge tries to find the money to build a pioneering Oxford Street department store.

includedAssets.title: Episode 2
includedAssets.synopsis: With Selfridge's struggling to attract customers, Harry turns to an acclaimed aviator in the hope of increasing the the store's publicity.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Selfridge's struggling to attract customers, Harry turns to an acclaimed aviator in the hope of increasing the the store's publicity.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Selfridge's struggling to attract customers, Harry turns to an acclaimed aviator in the hope of increasing the the store's publicity.

includedAssets.title: Episode 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Inspiration strikes for Harry as Ellen settles into her new apartment, while Lady Mae decides to help advance Rosalie's London social life.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Inspiration strikes for Harry as Ellen settles into her new apartment, while Lady Mae decides to help advance Rosalie's London social life.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Inspiration strikes for Harry as Ellen settles into her new apartment, while Lady Mae decides to help advance Rosalie's London social life.

includedAssets.title: Episode 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry meets an unexpected obstacle as he attempts to keep his wife and daughter onside and promote the store.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry meets an unexpected obstacle as he attempts to keep his wife and daughter onside and promote the store.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry meets an unexpected obstacle as he attempts to keep his wife and daughter onside and promote the store.

includedAssets.title: Episode 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry tries to help Agnes deal with her father's behaviour, while Ellen decides the time has come to have a conversation with Rose.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry tries to help Agnes deal with her father's behaviour, while Ellen decides the time has come to have a conversation with Rose.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry tries to help Agnes deal with her father's behaviour, while Ellen decides the time has come to have a conversation with Rose.

includedAssets.title: Episode 6
includedAssets.synopsis: The store is in a sombre mood as news of Harry's condition spreads. In his absence, Mr Grove takes charge and immediately ruffles feathers.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The store is in a sombre mood as news of Harry's condition spreads. In his absence, Mr Grove takes charge and immediately ruffles feathers.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The store is in a sombre mood as news of Harry's condition spreads. In his absence, Mr Grove takes charge and immediately ruffles feathers.

includedAssets.title: Episode 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle (John Sessions) comes to the store for a book signing, bringing with him a strange request for Harry.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle (John Sessions) comes to the store for a book signing, bringing with him a strange request for Harry.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle (John Sessions) comes to the store for a book signing, bringing with him a strange request for Harry.

includedAssets.title: Episode 8
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry goes on the counterattack after a family friend arrives in London to establish a rival store. Meanwhile, Lady Mae finds some suitors for Rose.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry goes on the counterattack after a family friend arrives in London to establish a rival store. Meanwhile, Lady Mae finds some suitors for Rose.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry goes on the counterattack after a family friend arrives in London to establish a rival store. Meanwhile, Lady Mae finds some suitors for Rose.

includedAssets.title: Episode 9
includedAssets.synopsis: Explorer Ernest Shackleton gives a lecture at the store, while Harry worries he may have been the cause of a terrible tragedy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Explorer Ernest Shackleton gives a lecture at the store, while Harry worries he may have been the cause of a terrible tragedy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Explorer Ernest Shackleton gives a lecture at the store, while Harry worries he may have been the cause of a terrible tragedy.

includedAssets.title: Episode 10
includedAssets.synopsis: As Lady Mae plans the king's visit to the store, Harry finds his professional success tainted by more personal troubles. Series finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Lady Mae plans the king's visit to the store, Harry finds his professional success tainted by more personal troubles. Series finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Lady Mae plans the king's visit to the store, Harry finds his professional success tainted by more personal troubles. Series finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: American Harry Selfridge decides to build the world's biggest and best department store on London's Oxford Street. First season of the early 20th century period drama starring Jeremy Piven.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry Selfridge decides to build the world's biggest and best department store on London's Oxford Street. Early 20th century period drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: American Harry Selfridge decides to build the world's biggest and best department store on London's Oxford Street. First season of the early 20th century period drama starring Jeremy Piven.
